sentence.text: The A Desintegrin And Metalloproteinase 23 (spermatogenesis) gene is epigenetically silenced in different types of tumors, and silencing is often associated with advanced disease and metastasis.

Rather, we observed that, in spermatogenesis-heterotypic environments, ADAM23-negative cells promote tumor growth and metastasis by enhancing the proliferation and invasion of adjacent A23-positive cells through the production ofÂ LGI4 (Leucine-rich Glioma Inactivated 4) and nitric oxide (NO).
